amendment.description: To require a report on the incorporation of elements of the reserve components into the Special Forces in the expansion of the Special Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4536 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4536 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6387) To require a report on the incorporation of elements of the reserve components into the Special Forces in the expansion of the Special Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4536 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Burns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4536 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
